participant_1.name: Ryan
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and determined, yet feels misunderstood by those close to him. He has a flair for luxury and enjoys the finer things in life.
participant_1.background: my family does not support my career choices. my dream car is a rolls royce ghost. i often shop for shoes and watches. i like shopping. i currently work for a watch dealer.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Friendly and sociable, with a passion for music and sports. She loves to connect with people and enjoys the thrill of competition.
participant_2.background: my favourite artist is travis scott. i've one older sister. i like playing basketball. my mother is a dentist. i'm currently looking for a job preferably at a restaurant.
